name: NewEra Finance
description: NewEra Finance, incubated by the Uniswap Foundation, is the first secondary marketplace for Real World Assets (RWA). NewEra Finance is innovating the $6.58B RWA market by enabling trading of 100+ tokenized bonds, commodities, stocks, and currencies. Founded by a leadership team with background at BlackRock and the German State Bank. At the very core of the offerings are advanced trading features such as Multi-Token Swaps for one-click portfolio creation, Auto-Limit Orders, and Dollar Cost Averaging powered by oracle-based pricing and TWAMM technology. In addition, the Unified RWA Explorer provides comprehensive market intelligence through partnerships with S&P Global, Chainlink, and Particula, aggregating data from 130+ liquidity sources.
